context_evidences: - Tate was initially detained for 24 hours on charges of human trafficking and rape. His brother Tristan was also part of the arrest, as were two other women, one who was described as a former policewoman. It's unclear if Tate will be released, but his Twitter account did show new tweets as of Dec. 30, apparently after the 24-hour period had ended. Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/andrew-tate-arrested-jerrys-pizza-box/ published on 2022-12-30 09:51:26

- Tate, banned from many social media platforms for misogynistic comments and hate speech, and his brother Tristan would be detained for 24 hours alongside two Romanian suspects, prosecutors from the anti organised-crime unit said in a statement after raiding their properties in Bucharest. Reference: https://www.smh.com.au/world/europe/andrew-tate-detained-in-human-trafficking-case-after-social-media-spat-with-greta-thunberg-20221230-p5c9gr.html published on 2022-12-30 00:23:25

- The brothers, who are British citizens, are under investigation for forming an organized criminal group responsible for kidnapping young women and exploiting them by making them the subjects of porn videos intended to be sold via websites like OnlyFans, sources told Romanian media. Reference: https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/pranavdixit/andrew-tate-tristan-tate-arrested-human-trafficking published on 2022-12-29 23:53:30

- DIICOT said on Thursday that the suspects, including two Romanians, would be detained for at least 24 hours for questioning. All four were later ordered by a judge to be held for 30 days during the ongoing investigation, the Associated Press reported. Reference: https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/pranavdixit/andrew-tate-tristan-tate-arrested-human-trafficking published on 2022-12-29 23:53:30

- The British national trolled Thunberg this week, posting about his petrol guzzling cars saying he owned 33 with “enormous emissions”. Reference: https://www.smh.com.au/world/europe/andrew-tate-detained-in-human-trafficking-case-after-social-media-spat-with-greta-thunberg-20221230-p5c9gr.html published on 2022-12-30 00:23:25

- In the video that Tate posted with the Jerry's Pizza boxes, he appeared to be attempting to respond in a clever manner to an extremely popular comeback tweet from Swedish environmental activist Greta Thunberg. Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/andrew-tate-arrested-jerrys-pizza-box/ published on 2022-12-30 09:51:26
correction_response:
This tweet is misleading. While Andrew Tate did post a video with a Jerry's Pizza box, a Romanian pizza chain, this was not the sole or primary evidence used by Romanian authorities to confirm his location. He had already indicated his presence in Romania through his social media posts earlier in the week. Furthermore, a spokesperson from Romania's anti-organized crime agency, DIICOT, dismissed the rumor that the pizza box was used as proof of his location as "funny". 
https://www.smh.com.au/world/europe/andrew-tate-detained-in-human-trafficking-case-after-social-media-spat-with-greta-thunberg-20221230-p5c9gr.html
https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/andrew-tate-arrested-jerrys-pizza-box/
note_1_text: “Speculation online centered on whether a distinctive pizza box … had helped lead the authorities to him, but Ramona Bolla, a spokeswoman for the Directorate for the Investigation of Organized Crime and Terrorism, told The New York Times … that that was not the case.”    https://www.nytimes.com/2022/12/30/world/europe/andrew-tate-romania-arrest.html
note_2_text: Tate has been in & out of Romania since he moved there 5 years ago. Although not confirmed, the pizza logo may have helped authorities.  As of Dec 29, prosecutors said the Tate brothers would be detained for 24 hours.   They allegedly forced women to make pornographic content.  https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/dec/30/andrew-tate-detained-in-romania-on-organised-and-charges   https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-64122628.amp
queries:
1. Andrew Tate in Romania 2022
2. Andrew Tate Jerry's Pizza social media post
3. Jerry's Pizza locations in Romania

5. Romanian authorities tracking Andrew Tate.
refute_evidences: - Bucharest: Romanian prosecutors have detained divisive internet personality and former professional kickboxer Andrew Tate on suspicion of human trafficking, rape and forming an organised crime group after he reportedly gave his location away during a social media spat with environmental campaigner Greta Thunberg. Reference: https://www.smh.com.au/world/europe/andrew-tate-detained-in-human-trafficking-case-after-social-media-spat-with-greta-thunberg-20221230-p5c9gr.html published on 2022-12-30 00:23:25

- The AP also noted that, earlier in the same week, Tate had "posted a video on Twitter of a mountainous region of Romania, the Eastern European country where he is reported to have lived for the last five years." In other words, he had already indicated on his public social media presence that he was in the country. Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/andrew-tate-arrested-jerrys-pizza-box/ published on 2022-12-30 09:51:26

- Ramona Bolla, a spokesperson from Romania's anti-organized crime agency, DIICOT, said that the rumor was "funny," but was not true, according to The Associated Press (AP). Reference: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/andrew-tate-arrested-jerrys-pizza-box/ published on 2022-12-30 09:51:26

- It culminated with him posting a video of himself with a cigar and pizza boxes printed with details of a Romanian restaurant. Reference: https://www.smh.com.au/world/europe/andrew-tate-detained-in-human-trafficking-case-after-social-media-spat-with-greta-thunberg-20221230-p5c9gr.html published on 2022-12-30 00:23:25
tweet_image2text: A photo of a person smoking a cigarette and holding a Jerry's Pizza box.
tweet_text: Romanian authorities needed proof that Andrew Tate was in the country so they reportedly used his social media posts. His ridiculous video yesterday featured a pizza from a Romanian pizza chain, Jerry's Pizza, confirming he was in the country. This is absolutely epic. https://t.co/kyz4pqegkJ
user_description: Wise Latina 🇵🇷. Clinical Instructor, Harvard Law Cyberlaw Clinic. Gender & Tech. 'Alleged expert' - Elon Musk. Bylines @Wired, @Slate. Views = my own.
